verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ ׀ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon נְגִינַ֬ת <S%H5058><s%> upon Neginah לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> [A Psalm] of David שִׁמְעָ֣ה <S%H8085><s%> Hear אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> O God רִנָּתִ֑י <S%H7440><s%> my cry הַ֝קְשִׁ֗יבָה <S%H7181><s%> attend תְּפִלָּתִֽי׃ <S%H8605><s%> unto my prayer

מִקְצֵ֤ה <S%H7097><s%> From the end הָאָ֨רֶץ ׀ <S%H776><s%> of the earth אֵלֶ֣יךָ <S%H413><s%> about אֶ֭קְרָא <S%H7121><s%> will I cry בַּעֲטֹ֣ף <S%H5848><s%> is overwhelmed לִבִּ֑י <S%H3820><s%> unto thee when my heart בְּצוּר־ <S%H6697><s%> me to the rock יָר֖וּם <S%H7311><s%> [that] is higher מִמֶּ֣נִּי <S%H4480><s%> than תַנְחֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5148><s%> lead

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָיִ֣יתָ <S%H1961><s%> have been מַחְסֶ֣ה <S%H4268><s%> For thou hast been a shelter לִ֑י מִגְדַּל־ <S%H4026><s%> tower עֹ֝֗ז <S%H5797><s%> for me [and] a strong מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> from אוֹיֵֽב׃ <S%H341><s%> the enemy

אָג֣וּרָה <S%H1481><s%> I will abide בְ֭אָהָלְךָ <S%H168><s%> in thy tabernacle עוֹלָמִ֑ים <S%H5769><s%> for ever אֶֽחֱסֶ֨ה <S%H2620><s%> I will trust בְסֵ֖תֶר <S%H5643><s%> in the covert כְּנָפֶ֣יךָ <S%H3671><s%> of thy wings סֶּֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> O אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> For thou O God שָׁמַ֣עְתָּ <S%H8085><s%> hast heard לִנְדָרָ֑י <S%H5088><s%> my vows נָתַ֥תָּ <S%H5414><s%> thou hast given יְ֝רֻשַּׁ֗ת <S%H3425><s%> [me] the heritage יִרְאֵ֥י <S%H3373><s%> of those that fear שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8034><s%> thy name

יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> life עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יְמֵי־ <S%H3117><s%> life מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king's תּוֹסִ֑יף <S%H3254><s%> Thou wilt prolong שְׁ֝נוֹתָ֗יו <S%H8141><s%> [and] his years כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> will be as דֹ֥ר <S%H1755><s%> as many וָדֹֽר׃ <S%H1755><s%> generations

יֵשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> He shall abide ע֭וֹלָם <S%H5769><s%> for ever לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> God חֶ֥סֶד <S%H2617><s%> mercy וֶ֝אֱמֶ֗ת <S%H571><s%> and truth מַ֣ן <S%H4487><s%> O prepare יִנְצְרֻֽהוּ׃ <S%H5341><s%> [which] may preserve

כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> So אֲזַמְּרָ֣ה <S%H2167><s%> So will I sing שִׁמְךָ֣ <S%H8034><s%> praise unto thy name לָעַ֑ד <S%H5703><s%> for ever לְֽשַׁלְּמִ֥י <S%H7999><s%> perform נְדָרַ֗י <S%H5088><s%> my vows י֣וֹם ׀ <S%H3117><s%> day יֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> day
